channel.title: Charm Sprites
channel.description:
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/charm-sprites-catch-them-if-you-can
After messing around with them for a bit I gathered a few numbers that may be helpful.
XP rate is around 60-70k/hr at 94 hunter
Gathering all 1k catches for the upgraded stick will take on average just over 2 hours (calculated 460 catches per hour)
Mystical charm slices have a drop rate of near 10%

item.title: Charm Sprites
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:5, topic:517828”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=636091.msg4288603#msg4288603 date=1366822837]
Would this be faster XP than Red chimchompas at 87?
[/quote]
I believe so, but by the data displayed in this thread the herblore habitat is faster xp.[/quote]

It’s more of an activity to get charms and hunter xp, not a efficient way of training pure hunter.

Read full topic

item.title: Charm Sprites
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Have you retested it since

It now only takes five charm slices to make a charm, rather than the original ten. The Hunter XP gained is increased too: it’s now competitive with other Hunter training methods at that level, and earns you plenty of Summoning charms at the same time.

?

Read full topic

item.title: Charm Sprites

item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

That sounds like it’s not worth it at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Charm Sprites
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

RuneScape

Charm Sprites: Catch Them If You Can!

We've updated charm sprites and their habitat, so they're a much more accessible method of training Hunter and a better source of Summoning charms. Catch enough charm sprites and you'll also be able to upgrade your Yaktwee stick with some handy...

After messing around with them for a bit I gathered a few numbers that may be helpful.

XP rate is around 60-70k/hr at 94 hunter

Gathering all 1k catches for the upgraded stick will take on average just over 2 hours (calculated 460 catches per hour)

Mystical charm slices have a drop rate of near 10%

Read full topic
